query:
WITH selected_jobs AS (
                  SELECT id
                  FROM job_executions
                  WHERE reschedule_after < NOW()
                  LIMIT $2
                  FOR UPDATE
              )
              UPDATE job_executions AS je
              SET reschedule_after = NOW() + $3::interval,
                  executing_server_id = $1
              FROM selected_jobs
              WHERE je.id = selected_jobs.id
              RETURNING je.id, je.job_type
